720371f-a.title: Manhattan: Henry Street - Jefferson Street
720371f-a.text:
169 to 173-177 (only part of hich is shown) Henry Street, vest of,
adjoining, and at the N.. corner of Jefferson Street, showing the Beth
Abraham Chasidim D'S'lonim Synagogue (No. 169). The congregation was
organised in 1897 and conducts its services in Hebrew and Yiddish.
Shown on the left is a portion of the School, No. 165-167, a unit of the
Synagogue.  June 6, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
720371f-a.folder: Henry Street & Jefferson Street, Manhattan, NY
